const common_1 = require("@nestjs/common");
const auth_service_1 = require("./auth.service");
const swagger_1 = require("@nestjs/swagger");
const auth_email_login_dto_1 = require("./dto/auth-email-login.dto");
const passport_1 = require("@nestjs/passport");
const auth_register_login_dto_1 = require("./dto/auth-register-login.dto");
const auth_email_isExist_dto_1 = require("./dto/auth-email-isExist.dto");
const auth_nickname_dto_1 = require("./dto/auth-nickname.dto");
const auth_social_login_dto_1 = require("./dto/auth-social-login.dto");
const auth_refresh_dto_1 = require("./dto/auth-refresh.dto");
const user_entity_1 = require("../users/entities/user.entity");
const auth_withdraw_dto_1 = require("./dto/auth-withdraw.dto");
const auth_reset_password_dto_1 = require("./dto/auth-reset-password.dto");
const auth_reset_password_dto_2 = require("./dto/auth-reset-password.dto");
let AuthController = class AuthController {
    constructor(authService) {
        this.authService = authService;
    }
    async register(createUserDto) {
        return this.authService.register(createUserDto);
    }
    async login(loginDto) {
        return this.authService.validateLogin(loginDto);
    }
    async checkIsEmailExist(checkEmailDto) {
        const checkResult = await this.authService.checkExistEmail(checkEmailDto);
        const resJson = {
            isExistEmail: checkResult ? user_entity_1.customBool.Y : user_entity_1.customBool.N,
        };
        return resJson;
    }
    async checkIsNickNameExist(checkEmailDto) {
        const checkResult = await this.authService.checkExistEmail(checkEmailDto);
        const resJson = {
            isExistNickname: checkResult ? user_entity_1.customBool.Y : user_entity_1.customBool.N,
        };
        return resJson;
    }
    async confirmEmail(hash, req, res) {
        await this.authService.confirmEmail(hash);
        return;
    }
    async forgetPassword(resetPasswordDto) {
        return this.authService.forgotPassword(resetPasswordDto.email);
    }
    async resetPasswordCompleteTemplate() {
        return;
    }
    async resetPasswordFailTemplate() {
        return;
    }
    async resetPasswordTemplate(hash) {
        console.log(hash);
        const data = {
            hash: hash,
            backendUrl: process.env.BACKEND_DOMAIN,
        };
        return data;
    }
    async resetPasswordComplete(resetPasswordDto) {
        const result = await this.authService.resetPassword(resetPasswordDto.hash, resetPasswordDto.password);
        return { result: result };
    }
    async getRandomNickname() {
        const nickname = await this.authService.getUniqueNickName();
        const resJson = { nickname };
        return resJson;
    }
    async socialLogin(authSocialLoginIngDto) {
        console.log('body dto', authSocialLoginIngDto.userId);
        const getUserAuthInfoByUserIdResult = await this.authService.getUserAuthInfoByUserId(authSocialLoginIngDto.userId);
        const { token, refreshToken, user } = getUserAuthInfoByUserIdResult;
        const resJson = {
            jwtToken: token,
            refreshToken,
            user: user,
        };
        return resJson;
    }
    async refresh(refreshDto) {
        return this.authService.refreshJwtToken(refreshDto.refreshToken);
    }
    logout(req) {
        return this.authService.logout(req.user);
    }
    withdraw(req, authWithdrawDto) {
        return this.authService.withdraw(req.user.id, authWithdrawDto);
    }
};
